channel.title: Anybody Know Any Tutorial On How To Make Your Own Client?
channel.description: So I've played on many different servers before and I began making my own server. But whats missing is my own client. Does anybody know any tuts, guides, ect on how to make your own client, with it's on models and where to find models? I know it's quite an odd request but it would be much appreciated if you could point me in the right direction.

item.title: Anybody Know Any Tutorial On How To Make Your Own Client?
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

huum think before i post?? you think before you post they post question’s in the tutorial section…and its against the rules…so check the rules every now and then.

Read full topic

item.title: Anybody Know Any Tutorial On How To Make Your Own Client?
item.dc:creator: @alexsasha2 alexsasha2
item.description:
@alexsasha2 wrote:

no it’s not because in the tutorial section people will post the link for the exact tutorial you need so you would get the most help. Lots of people post questions in the tutorial questions just look through the pages you’ll find tons of them. Next time think before you post.

Read full topic
